name: instance-stringer
description: Convert content of a class instance to a string.

scripts.web:build: browserify index.js --standalone instanceStringer -o web/instance-stringer.js && cd web && uglifyjs instance-stringer.js --compress --mangle -o instance-stringer.min.js --source-map url=instance-stringer.min.js.map
scripts.build: npm run lint && npm run coverage && npm run web:build && node test/web/make.js

author: Takayuki Sato
